name: contentstudio
description: AI-powered metadata generation for YouTube and Podcasts

scripts.build:all: npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:electron: npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload && wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.download:all:mac: bash scripts/download-all.sh mac && npm run copy:ffmpeg
scripts.download:all:mac-arm64: bash scripts/download-all.sh mac-arm64 && npm run copy:ffmpeg
scripts.download:all:mac-x64: bash scripts/download-all.sh mac-x64 && npm run copy:ffmpeg
scripts.download:all:win: bash scripts/download-all.sh win && npm run copy:ffmpeg
scripts.download:all:linux: bash scripts/download-all.sh linux && npm run copy:ffmpeg
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder build
scripts.package:mac: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac
scripts.package:mac-arm64: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.package:mac-x64: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.package:win: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.package:win-x64: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.package:linux: npm run copy:ffmpeg && npm run build:all && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.clean:package:mac: npm run clean && npm run download:all:mac && npm run package:mac
scripts.clean:package:mac-arm64: npm run clean && npm run download:all:mac-arm64 && npm run package:mac-arm64
scripts.clean:package:mac-x64: npm run clean && npm run download:all:mac-x64 && npm run package:mac-x64
scripts.clean:package:win: npm run clean && npm run download:all:win && npm run package:win
scripts.clean:package:win-x64: npm run clean && npm run download:all:win && npm run package:win-x64
scripts.clean:package:linux: npm run clean && npm run download:all:linux && npm run package:linux

author: Owen Morgan
